Feature: User can create and update cards assigning pages and links
BugFix: Fixed the issue where user could not match their current pages with links

Feature: User can see pages and Sub pages in the CMS Pages Gallery
BugFix: Fixed the slider of cards issue. Users can modify fluently

Feature: Now user can add components in existing sections
User can get all types of media in the media library
Gallary got a new look
BugFix: User can create sliders seamlessly
Removed success and error messages from the page editor and components

Feature: Introduced tab view in Sliders Component
User can Create, Edit, Update & Delete Slider of cards in the CMS
MAVE Logo got a new look
BugFix: User turn image sliders into card sliders and vice versa
Page editor mode shows the section title in the page editor
Fixed the issue where updating section did not close the editor mode
Edit Mode 2 is gone
Card multilingual title will only show if available

Feature: User can add section title in the page editor
Added Dual title and Description in page edit mode
Added documentation & User Guide
Added FAQ Page in the CMS
Added Support Page
Rich text editors are now more upgraded and user friendly
Media selector is now more user friendly
Creator Studio has got feature to search pages by their name/title
User can upload and see documents (e.g. PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX) in the CMS Documents Section in the Components
Users can delete files instantly without waiting for the request to be processed
Menu Items got parent menu feature. Now user can create nested menu items
User can see the parent menu of the menu item in the CMS
User can set 3 types of links in the menu item link: Independent, Page, Mega Menu
Now admins can create user from MAVE Admin -> Profile
Now users can change theme to from top right corner of the CMS
Authorised users can see avatar in their profile picture
Media Library is now 1.2x faster than before
User can see tabs as Photos and Videos in Media Library
Now user can update sliders more easily in the CMS page editor
BugFix: Users can now add & update multilingual title to sliders
Change of all pages names will no longer happen when updating a page

Feature: Now user can update page slug in page editor
Changelog version automatically updates in the CMS from the changelog.json file
BugFix: Now user can add & update multilingual title to menu items

Feature: Added 'Documents' in Components
User can upload documents in the CMS
User can view the uploaded documents in the CMS
User can delete the uploaded documents in the CMS
BugFix: Changing single media in page editor no longer changes all the media in the section
Fixed the position of 'Go Top' & 'Go Bottom' buttons in the page editor
Fixed Content view hide overflow
Creating new page will no longer change other pages names

Feature: User needs to refresh page after adding component to see the edit or delete Section option
When creating a new page, user needs to manually refresh the page to access/expand the newly made Page.
BugFix: When Viewing Navbar nested Menus in cms, all the nested menus become opened and can only be closed by pressing the menu of the 1st Nav bar
When creating new Navbar, it gets auto submitted when the menu is selected/clicked.
User Cannot Delete Pages.
When adding Images in a Section, User does not see media library but instead a drop down menu with Image IDs.
When adding Forms in a Section, the drop down menu shows no data.
When adding Events in a Section, the drop down menu shows no data.
After Editing a Section, a new section is created but only visually created.
After creating a card in a section, if User goes to Edit Mode and changes the card from the drop down menu, User gets redirected to a Application error page.

Feature: Need to Preview Media
Need to Preview Slider
Need to show 'Page Name' along with 'Page ID' in the pages list.
BugFix: Menu items are premade, addtional menu items cannot be created
In the Navbar section, user is not able to update the menu of the Navbar.
Card-> Create New -> Select Media -> Unselect Media Option is not working.
Edit Section -> Add Component is not working
Edit Section -> Add Section Not working
Edit Section -> Updating one paragraph changes all other paragraphs in same section

BugFix: Resolved the absence of gas weight in order details.
Fixed the issue where dealership opportunity information was not fully included.
Addressed the static display of footer menu titles.
Corrected a local storage error occurring on the profile page.
Updated menu items to accurately reflect Bangla titles.
Implemented a hamburger view for menu lists in the navigation bar.
Rectified grid issues in the card gallery layout.
Users can now create additional menu items instead of being restricted to premade ones.
Users can now update the menu of the Navbar section as intended.
Resolved the issue where the Unselect Media Option was not working when creating a new card.
Users can now preview media and sliders as expected.
The "Add Component" feature in the Edit section is now functioning properly.
The "Add section" feature in Edit section is now working correctly.
"Page Name" is now displayed along with "Page ID" in the pages list.
Resolved the issue where updating one paragraph would change all other paragraphs in the same section.
Canceling the Edit in Creator mode will no longer result in the removal of the section.
Resolved the issue where an error would occur if the user cancels their creation after adding the first component by pressing the close button.
Users no longer need to refresh the page to see the edit or delete section option after adding a component.
Fixed the problem where all nested menus in the Navbar section would open when viewing them in the CMS, and now they can be opened individually & vice versa.
Navbar creation will no longer automatically submit when the menu is selected or clicked.
Users no longer need to manually refresh the page to access or expand the newly created Page after creating a new page.
Users can now delete pages as intended.
Resolved the issue where users were not able to see the media library when adding Images in a section, now they see a drop-down menu with Image IDs as expected.
The drop-down menu now shows data when adding Forms or Events in a section.
After editing a section, only one section is created visually as intended.
Fixed the issue where editing a card in a section and then changing it from the drop-down menu would redirect the user to an Application error page.
